page.title: 03A typical week at school
page.content: I get up at 8 o'clock and have my breakfast,then a wash.My friend calls for me and we walk to school.We play football until the whistle blows. We usually do Mathematics and Language work in the morning.Sometimes we write stories and on Monday morning we do spellings.At dinnertime I have a school dinner although some people have a packed lunch or go home.Then we play football until the whistle blows at 1.25pm. In the afternoon we sometimes do art,and once a week we do PE or games.We also do RE and in winter we go swimming.We spend the whole of Wednesday working on a topic for science or environmental studies. My favourite subject is environmental studies and I like games.
